channel.title: Bringing back what was loved by many destroyed by one
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i66.tinypic.com/24104uw.png[/img][/CENTER]
A quick thread just to make everyone aware the thread will be updated at a later date, PvP-Planet a blast from the past, i had PvP-Planet on my PC for a while when i was doing business with rag3. However I decided to bring it back but revised and dedicated to make it capable for all kind of player base. Including all skills working old school bosses and much more, will take some pictures when I'm at home and ill re-edit the thread, This is not a leach or copy its the original please take a moment to check the forums. We do not have a homepage at the moment as I'm Looking for a custom Landing Page. [CENTER][QUOTE]Updates: -Fixed item Slots -Fixed Cammy PvP -Fixed Cursor Re-positioning -Added pure load spawn gear -Fixed random crashes -Fixed Animation when fighting -Rewrite Combat system -Fixed new item search connected to itemdb amazing work done there -Added Preload Gears -Added an icon to spec easily and faster [/QUOTE][/CENTER]
[SPOILER=MEDIA][CENTER][IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/67ec0fba52fe59680598548de49356ba.png[/img]
[IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/4afd37e5a22585e29e90b5d5d6ae9fe2.png[/img]
[IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/203cc6a0691a2564f94258fc2b1c6e6b.png[/img]
(Clicking the Fist icon, will activate the special attack! Making it easier to spec!) [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/5bae5425bd5da6d76e54e30ada5df74d.png[/img][/CENTER][/SPOILER
Credits And Massive Thanks TO: Balla Matty
If I forgot anyone else, please mention it.
Progress: -Fixed item Slots -Fixed Cammpy pvp -Fixed Cursor Re-postioniong -Added pre load spawngear -fixed random crashes -Fixed Animation when fighting -Rewrite Combat system -Fixed new itemsearch contected to itemdb.biz amazing work done there
Will upload media Tomorrow Alot of developers has toke there time out to contribute to this project bringing back the old school pvp-planet, is a great pleasure Thanks to pvp-planet staff team and supporters/members
Some media update: https://gyazo.com/203cc6a0691a2564f94258fc2b1c6e6b https://gyazo.com/5bae5425bd5da6d76e54e30ada5df74d 1. Bounty hunter crater with working interfaces/systems penalty and timers.[Progress] -----> https://gyazo.com/24b0f702586ee42162a9192905a22f1d 2. Added trade system and dueling system. 3. Added full sprite support for the duel arena options for challenging other players. would like to say a huge thank you to everyone who has supported me from the begging and the start IE [Jay] how ever this is coming along pretty faster than expected, i would like to say it is highly appreciated and respected for everyone participation in the community. here are some new coming updates Progress - New welcome interface Current one > Give me a moment < - write from scratch spawn-tab + New redesigned. - no random dcs -World Pvp Ep System > Search wiki < for how it works < Google < -World Pvp Bounty System with Shop rewards > also check Wiki < Google < -Home Bh craters to 100% functional with rewards and high-score board, once completed will upload bh craters high-score to website -custom homepage along with a custom theme -check all items like is spawn-able and not spawn-able -vote/donation system. [last thing] before release. -custom player profile and able to search preview > -Staff list along with request help preview > https://gyazo.com/c66d6490f11e120e5ef5bcf3ac83054e -Loyalty system with shop rewards> http://i.imgur.com/bxGmakF.png| http://i.imgur.com/bxGmakF.png -custom player profile >http://i.imgur.com/8vf5M6z.gif -two different worlds -new custom background will update the progress. ------------------------------------------------------ There is a lot more been done but this was just something quick while i was on my ipad Sorry for half hearted, will put the effort when back at home Thank you for the support and pvp-planet community/staff team and MOPARSCAPE support keeping getting deleted lmao. http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/projects/619229-pvp-planet-317-revised-4.html
[QUOTE=Ron Swanson;5070476]Best of luck, it'll be nice to follow this.
I hope you make the most of this and take it in a direction it truly deserves, because the original was absolute garbage.[/QUOTE]
Wow the best comment i have ever received i appreciate that alot Ron thank you ever so much.
Update: Entire Mousing Decection was completely off [COLOR="#00FF00"][ Fixed ] [/COLOR] New login screen need to change setgear.[COLOR="#00FF00"] [fully function][/COLOR] need to edit items/ figure a good thing for iron man mode since world pvp[ suggestions toke in note ] [COLOR="#0000FF"][doneish][/COLOR] cache downloader done got to annoying[COLOR="#00FF00"] [ done][/COLOR] when open client get white screen[COLOR="#00FF00"] [ fixed][/COLOR] player-save error [COLOR="#00FF00"][ fixed] [/COLOR] Custom spawntab, fully functional[COLOR="#0000FF"][doneish just gotta edit setget] [/COLOR]check known dupes and test for plenty more [COLOR="#FF8C00"][ requesting] -> we can negoiate the price.> glitches we can negotiate becauses theres a couple models wrong [leave comment if intrestede] new background [awaiting][/COLOR] Custom homepage along with custom forum theme [COLOR="#FF8C00"][awaitng] [/COLOR] -custom loginscreen[only one whats caught my eye so far. searching] might look into a custom dedesign -jframe work, fullyscreen ect[inprocess] -stabliity/ performance new game engine and more[inprocess] -player profile [in process] -client launcher[in process]
[SPOIL]Media can be found here: [url=https://gyazo.com/a63938450add8052345b7a0551f7c86a]https://gyazo.com/a63938450add8052345b7a0551f7c86a[/url] [url=https://gyazo.com/534a8e868e7ae1e92534616e7a2c96f9]https://gyazo.com/534a8e868e7ae1e92534616e7a2c96f9[/url][/SPOIL]
i appreciate all the support and lovely comment, it makes the universe go round :) Thank you Ryan PVP-PLANET Community Pvp-planet staff

item.title: Bringing back what was loved by many destroyed by one
item.dc:creator: @RealityOfPking RealityOfPking
item.description:
@RealityOfPking wrote:

[CENTER]

24104uw.png728×92
[/CENTER]

A quick thread just to make everyone aware the thread will be updated at a later date,
PvP-Planet a blast from the past, i had PvP-Planet on my PC for a while when i was doing business with rag3. However I decided to bring it back but revised and dedicated to make it capable for all kind of player base. Including all skills working old school bosses and much more, will take some pictures when I’m at home and ill re-edit the thread, This is not a leach or copy its the original please take a moment to check the forums. We do not have a homepage at the moment as I’m Looking for a custom Landing Page.
[CENTER][QUOTE]Updates:
-Fixed item Slots
-Fixed Cammy PvP
-Fixed Cursor Re-positioning
-Added pure load spawn gear
-Fixed random crashes
-Fixed Animation when fighting
-Rewrite Combat system
-Fixed new item search connected to itemdb amazing work done there
-Added Preload Gears
-Added an icon to spec easily and faster
[/QUOTE][/CENTER]

[SPOILER=MEDIA][CENTER]

67ec0fba52fe59680598548de49356ba.png1000×601

4afd37e5a22585e29e90b5d5d6ae9fe2.png751×497

203cc6a0691a2564f94258fc2b1c6e6b.png765×523

(Clicking the Fist icon, will activate the special attack! Making it easier to spec!)

5bae5425bd5da6d76e54e30ada5df74d.png760×529
[/CENTER][/SPOILER

Credits And Massive Thanks TO:
Balla
Matty

If I forgot anyone else, please mention it.

Progress:
-Fixed item Slots
-Fixed Cammpy pvp
-Fixed Cursor Re-postioniong
-Added pre load spawngear
-fixed random crashes
-Fixed Animation when fighting
-Rewrite Combat system
-Fixed new itemsearch contected to itemdb.biz amazing work done there

Will upload media Tomorrow Alot of developers has toke there time out to contribute to this project bringing back the old school pvp-planet, is a great pleasure
Thanks to pvp-planet staff team and supporters/members

Some media update:
https://gyazo.com/203cc6a0691a2564f94258fc2b1c6e6b
https://gyazo.com/5bae5425bd5da6d76e54e30ada5df74d

  1. Bounty hunter crater with working interfaces/systems penalty and timers.[Progress] ----->
    https://gyazo.com/24b0f702586ee42162a9192905a22f1d
  2. Added trade system and dueling system.
  3. Added full sprite support for the duel arena options for challenging other players.
    would like to say a huge thank you to everyone who has supported me from the begging and the start IE [Jay]
    how ever this is coming along pretty faster than expected, i would like to say it is highly appreciated and respected for everyone participation in the community. here are some new coming updates
    Progress
  • New welcome interface Current one > Give me a moment <
  • write from scratch spawn-tab + New redesigned.
  • no random dcs
    -World Pvp Ep System > Search wiki < for how it works < Google <
    -World Pvp Bounty System with Shop rewards > also check Wiki < Google <
    -Home Bh craters to 100% functional with rewards and high-score board, once completed will upload bh craters high-score to website
    -custom homepage along with a custom theme
    -check all items like is spawn-able and not spawn-able
    -vote/donation system. [last thing] before release.
    -custom player profile and able to search preview >
    -Staff list along with request help preview > https://gyazo.com/c66d6490f11e120e5ef5bcf3ac83054e
    -Loyalty system with shop rewards> http://i.imgur.com/bxGmakF.png| http://i.imgur.com/bxGmakF.png
    -custom player profile >http://i.imgur.com/8vf5M6z.gif
    -two different worlds
    -new custom background
    will update the progress.

There is a lot more been done but this was just something quick while i was on my ipad
Sorry for half hearted, will put the effort when back at home
Thank you for the support and pvp-planet community/staff team and MOPARSCAPE support
keeping getting deleted lmao.
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/projects/619229-pvp-planet-317-revised-4.html

[QUOTE=Ron Swanson;5070476]Best of luck, it’ll be nice to follow this.

I hope you make the most of this and take it in a direction it truly deserves, because the original was absolute garbage.[/QUOTE]

Wow the best comment i have ever received i appreciate that alot Ron thank you ever so much.

Update:
Entire Mousing Decection was completely off [COLOR="#00FF00"][ Fixed ] [/COLOR]
New login screen need to change setgear.[COLOR="#00FF00"] [fully function][/COLOR] need to edit items/ figure a good thing for iron man mode since world pvp[ suggestions toke in note ] [COLOR="#0000FF"][doneish][/COLOR]
cache downloader done got to annoying[COLOR="#00FF00"] [ done][/COLOR]
when open client get white screen[COLOR="#00FF00"] [ fixed][/COLOR]
player-save error [COLOR="#00FF00"][ fixed] [/COLOR]
Custom spawntab, fully functional[COLOR="#0000FF"][doneish just gotta edit setget]
[/COLOR]check known dupes and test for plenty more [COLOR="#FF8C00"][ requesting] -> we can negoiate the price.> glitches we can negotiate becauses theres a couple models wrong [leave comment if intrestede]
new background [awaiting][/COLOR]
Custom homepage along with custom forum theme [COLOR="#FF8C00"][awaitng] [/COLOR]
-custom loginscreen[only one whats caught my eye so far. searching] might look into a custom dedesign
-jframe work, fullyscreen ect[inprocess]
-stabliity/ performance new game engine and more[inprocess]
-player profile [in process]
-client launcher[in process]

[SPOIL]Media can be found here:
https://gyazo.com/a63938450add8052345b7a0551f7c86a
https://gyazo.com/534a8e868e7ae1e92534616e7a2c96f9[/SPOIL]

i appreciate all the support and lovely comment, it makes the universe go round
Thank you
Ryan
PVP-PLANET Community
Pvp-planet staff
